topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538dc5886368720365ee0500#post_538dc5886368720365ee0500
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538df7fb6368727c20a00400#post_538df7fb6368727c20a00400
I dislike the cliche of the "gun nut who views his guns as an extension of his less than stellar penis." It feels like easy, cruel humor to me and relies on idiot pop psychology.

God fucking dammit if some people don't decide to live up to the cliche though.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
Hey everyone:
Tired of 24/7 news constantly spewing bullshit they haven't researched?  Tired of people saying that we're going to have flying deloreans that travel time in the next year while saying things like vaccines are fake?  Okay that's enough of that; in all seriousness I found a actually good science news site:
http://singularityhub.com/2014/06/03/unlike-samantha-in-the-movie-her-artificial-intelligence-will-have-a-body/
A lot of the news stories are actually really well done and it contains 0 political bullshit.  Groovie.


In all seriousness this is one of the reasons why I rarely actually pay attention to 24/7 news; why invest in political bullshit spin when you can actually get news from actual professionals with actual facts?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
